sys_script_include.description: This function is to be called in a before display business rule on a table where specific read only fields should be formatted in a specific way. The config parameter defines how specific fields should be formatted.
sys_script_include.name: ExecuteBusinessRuleNumberFormat

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_55109a54db248550bcced03cd39619be
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_devtools.ExecuteBusinessRuleNumberFormat</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>This function is to be called in a before display business rule on a table where specific read only fields should be formatted in a specific way. The config parameter defines how specific fields should be formatted. </description><name>ExecuteBusinessRuleNumberFormat</name><script><![CDATA[function ExecuteBusinessRuleNumberFormat(record,config)
{
	var formatconfig = {};
	formatconfig[record.getRecordClassName()] = config;
	var devtools = g_scratchpad['devtools'] || {};
	devtools['formatconfig'] = formatconfig;
	g_scratchpad['devtools'] = devtools;
	
	//gs.addInfoMessage('Number Formatter active!!');
	//g_scratchpad['devtools']['numberformat']['config'] = config;
	//gs.addInfoMessage(x_snc_devtools.RenderValue(g_scratchpad));
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-16 21:24:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>55109a54db248550bcced03cd39619be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ExecuteBusinessRuleNumberFormat</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_55109a54db248550bcced03cd39619be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-17 16:40:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
